short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate any article using OpenAI's ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows you to seamlessly translate any web page into any language without needing to reload the page. Simply install the extension and browse the web as usual. When you come across a page that you'd like to translate, simply activate the extension. The page will be instantly translated without any interruptions to your browsing experience.
